name: HIGH STAR Men's Regular Jeans
description: Step into the epitome of style and comfort with High Star Jeans – where individuality meets denim perfection. Elevate your wardrobe with our diverse range of fits, from the timeless elegance of straight fit to the laid-back charm of boyfriend fit. Whether you're embracing the classic allure of boot leg or opting for the effortlessly cool baggy fit, High Star caters to every fashion inclination. Crafted with precision and passion, our jeans boast exceptional durability, superior comfort, and a touch of edgy sophistication. Embrace your unique style journey with High Star, where each pair of jeans tells a story as distinct as you are. Redefine fashion, redefine you – High Star, your denim, your story.

name: tweedle Mens Ethnic Kashmiri Paisley Design Shawl/Stole, Fusion Wear Wrap for Gents, Stylish wrap/Dupatta for Kurta
detailsAboutThisItem: This is a large size shawl, perfect for wrapping around shoulders and providing complete comfort. It is 80 inches in length and 40 inches in width..

This men’s shawl is made using fine quality acrylic fiber. The Fusion design shawl with floral, paisley and geometric patterns is a must have in your wardrobe. Ideal give away for anniversary celebrations and weddings.

Ideal for teaming up with both traditional Indian attires like Jodhpuri Suits, Kurta Pyjama & and also modern Western outfits. It can be innovatively adorned as a stylish muffler or scarf for young boys and men.
description: Tweedle brings for you this fine quality Acrylic woven pashmina style Stole / Shawl / Wrap which is a great accessory to have this winter to wear on both formal and casual occasions. It is a great accompaniment for your party, evening or daily wear. It’s very versatile and one can be really imaginative in the way to drape this on oneself. The design is truly elegant and contemporary. It’s an ideal gift for your near and dear ones.
